mapper.select: SELECT P.PAT_CODE, P.PAT_NAME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(P.PAT_BRTHDY),'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAT_BRTHDY, LISTAGG(RD.DOCUMENT_TYPE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RD.DOCUMENT_TYPE) AS DOCUMENT_TYPE, LISTAGG(RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_NO, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_NO) AS REQ_DOCUMENT_NO, CC.COM_CODE_NAME AS PAT_GEN, RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_STATUS, RD.DETAIL_NO, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') as DETAIL_REG_DATE, E.EMP_NM, C.TREAT_NO, HF.HOS_FC_NAME FROM TB_REQUEST_DOCUMENT RD INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON RD.DETAIL_NO = CD.DETAIL_NO INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON CD.TREAT_NO = C.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON C.RCEPT_NO = R.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC_SCHEDULE CS ON CS.SCHD_NO = R.SCHD_NO INNER JOIN TB_HOSPITAL_FACILITY HF ON HF.HOS_FC_NO = CS.HOS_FC_NO INNER JOIN TB_EMPLOYEE E ON CS.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN TB_PATIENT P INNER JOIN TB_COMMON_CODE CC ON P.PAT_GEN_CODE = CC.COM_CODE AND CC.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND' ON R.PAT_CODE = P.PAT_CODE WHERE RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_STATUS = 'DOWT' AND CS.EMP_NO = #{empNo} GROUP BY P.PAT_CODE, P.PAT_NAME, P.PAT_BRTHDY, CC.COM_CODE_NAME, RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_STATUS, RD.DETAIL_NO, CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE, E.EMP_NM, C.TREAT_NO, HF.HOS_FC_NAME

SELECT P.PAT_CODE , P.PAT_NAME , P.PAT_TEL , P.PAT_IHIDNUM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(p.PAT_BRTHDY),'YYYY-MM-DD') as PAT_BRTHDY, LISTAGG(RD.DOCUMENT_TYPE, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RD.DOCUMENT_TYPE) AS DOCUMENT_TYPE, LISTAGG(RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_NO, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_NO) AS REQ_DOCUMENT_NO, (SELECT C.COM_CODE_NAME FROM TB_PATIENT P, TB_COMMON_CODE C WHERE P.PAT_GEN_CODE = C.COM_CODE AND P.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C.COM_CODE_GRP = 'GEND') AS PAT_GEN_CODE , P.PAT_ADDR , P.PAT_DTL_ADDR , P.PAT_ZIP , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE),'YYYY-MM-DD') as DETAIL_REG_DATE FROM TB_PATIENT P INNER JOIN TB_RECEIPT R ON P.PAT_CODE = R.PAT_CODE INNER JOIN TB_CLINIC C ON R.RCEPT_NO = C.RCEPT_NO INNER JOIN TB_CHART_DETAIL CD ON C.TREAT_NO = CD.TREAT_NO INNER JOIN TB_REQUEST_DOCUMENT RD ON RD.DETAIL_NO = CD.DETAIL_NO WHERE P.PAT_CODE = #{patCode} AND C.TREAT_NO = #{treatNo} AND RD.REQ_DOCUMENT_STATUS = 'DOWT' GROUP BY P.PAT_CODE, P.PAT_NAME, P.PAT_TEL, P.PAT_IHIDNUM, P.PAT_BRTHDY, P.PAT_ADDR, P.PAT_DTL_ADDR, P.PAT_ZIP, CD.DETAIL_REG_DATE
